item.title: github: Access all pull request comments without leaving the new Files changed page
item.description:
GitHub’s new pull request “Files changed” page now lets reviewers access all pull request comments without switching to the “Conversation” tab.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: Show profile names (first and last name) alongside user handles
item.description:
GitHub now lets enterprise and organization admins choose whether to display users’ profile names (first and last) alongside their handles across the enterprise UI.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: Teams management now moved to Settings
item.description:
GitHub moved Teams management out of the left-hand navigation into a dedicated page under Settings to simplify navigation and surface other important features more easily.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: GitHub Copilot CLI: Enhanced model selection, image support, and streamlined UI
item.description:
GitHub announced updates to Copilot CLI that add enhanced model selection, support for images, and a streamlined user interface following the product’s public preview and active user feedback.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: azure: Retirement: The Insights blade in AKS is now called Monitor
item.description:
The Insights blade in Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) has been renamed to Monitor and moved from the Monitoring section to the top-level navigation; monitoring data and features remain unchanged.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: github: Recent changes to the home dashboard disabled
item.description:
GitHub tested content and layout improvements to the home dashboard with a small subset of users; the test has ended and the recent changes have been disabled.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: GitHub Mobile now supports iOS 26 with refined visuals and smoother navigation
item.description:
GitHub Mobile now supports iOS 26, bringing a refined visual language, smoother motion, and tighter system integration to make navigating and creating pull requests feel more natural.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: The dashboard-feed page gets a refreshed, faster experience
item.description:
GitHub updated the /dashboard-feed page to align it with improvements made to the homepage “For you” feed, delivering a refreshed, more consistent, and faster experience across the site.

  • Source: GitHub
